verses.roman:
avatīrya yador vaṁśe
bibhrad rūpam anuttamam
karmāṇy uddāma-vṛttāni
hitāya jagato 'kṛthāḥ

synonyms: avatīrya—descending; yadoḥ—of King Yadu; vaṁśe—into the dynasty; bibhrat—bearing; rūpam—a transcendental form; anuttamam—unexcelled; karmāṇi—activities; uddāma-vṛttāni—comprised of magnanimous deeds; hitāya—for the benefit; jagataḥ—of the universe; akṛthāḥ—You performed.
translation: Descending into the dynasty of King Yadu, You have manifested Your unique transcendental form, and for the benefit of the entire universe You have executed magnanimous transcendental activities.
